article_title: Wellington Is Bigger On Tech And Innovation Than You Think

article_metadata.description: This story is a part of a series titled 'Wellington Aims To Be Most Prosperous, Livable and Vibrant City in the Southern Hemisphere'. The gravity of tech disruption around the world has changed how competitive economies are. Relying on natural resources like oil and coal is no longer enough. The countries [...]
